string-array.name: rtt_att_messages
string-array.item: "Ukuze usebenzise i-RTT, udinga ukuxhumeka ku-LTE noma ube nokushaya kwe-Wi-Fi okuvuliwe. "
"Ungaqala ukusebenzisa i-RTT noma kunini uma uxhumana naloyo ifoni yakhe esekela i-RTT noma exhunywe kudivayisi ye-TTY. "
"Ukuze ubone inketho ye-RTT yamakholi angenayo naphumayo, setha inketho yekholi le-RTT ibe ukuhlala ibonakala. "
"I-RTT ifaka umsindo, ngakho-ke thulisa ikholi uma ungadingi noma ungafuni ukwabelana ngomsindo. "
"Amakholi e-RTT asebenzisa amaminithi ezwi. Hlola uhlelo lwakho lwesilinganiso ukuze uthole imininingwane. "

string-array.name: rtt_tmo_messages
string-array.item: "Uzodinga ukuthi uxhumeke ku-4G LTE noma kunethiwekhi ye-Wi-Fi. "
"Umuntu okhuluma naye kufanele ukuthi naye asebenzise ifoni esekela i-RTT noma axhumeke kudivayisi ye-TTY (ifoni yombhalo). "
Uma unike amandla i-RTT, isithonjana se-RTT sizobonakala kuwo wonke amakholi angenayo.
